itineraryData.itinerary_title: Your Guide to an Unforgettable Trip
itineraryData.itinerary_description:
Embark on a journey filled with serenity and culture as you explore the stunning landscapes of Sri Lanka. Immerse yourself in the vibrant city life, unwind on the picturesque coast, and discover the rich cultural heritage of this mesmerizing destination.

Indulge in thrilling adventures and relax in luxurious accommodations, taking in the beauty of your surroundings. With a perfect blend of excitement and relaxation, your days will be filled with unforgettable experiences and moments of pure bliss.

Prepare to dive into the depths of the ocean or unleash your creativity in a mehendi mixology workshop. Each day presents new opportunities to explore, unwind, and create lasting memories.

With a perfect balance of adventure and leisure, your time in Sri Lanka promises to be an enriching and fulfilling experience. Get ready to immerse yourself in the beauty and charm of this magical destination, where every moment is a chance to discover something new and exciting.

data.activity_description: Embark on a serene 5-night, 6-day journey through Sri Lanka, starting from Colombo Bandaranaike International Airport. Your private vehicle with an English-speaking driver will take you to Kandy, Nuwara Eliya, Yala, Bentota, and Colombo. Enjoy comfortable travel with amenities like bottled water and charging ports. The itinerary includes stays in each location and ends with a drop-off at the airport. This service is perfect for travelers seeking a hassle-free and flexible way to explore the beautiful sights of Sri Lanka.

service_data.service_description:
1N Kandy - 1N Nuwara Eliya - 1N Yala - 1N Bentota - 1N Colombo


Enjoy a comfortable and hassle-free journey across Sri Lanka with a private, air-conditioned vehicle and an English-speaking driver at your disposal. This service covers round-trip transportation to Kandy, Nuwara Eliya, Yala, Bentota, and Colombo, with one night in each location. The vehicle is equipped with ample luggage space,bottled water, and charging ports for your convenience. Pricing includes fuel, driver, and tolls, ensuring a smooth and flexible travel experience tailored to your needs.

DAY 1:Colombo airport to Kandy Hotel

DAY 2:Kandy to Numara Eliya

DAY 3:Nuwara Eliya to Yala

DAY 4:Yala to Bentota

DAY 5 :Bentota to Colombo

DAY 6:Colombo City to Airport
service_data.service_location: Colombo Bandaranaike International Airport (CMB), Katunayake, Sri Lanka
service_data.remarks: This is like a service customers are going visiting to.

data.activity_description: Embark on a captivating journey through Sri Lanka with our 4 Nights / 5 Days Serene Sri Lanka: Culture, Coast & City Escape package. Explore the historical city of Kandy, the serene coastal town of Bentota, and the dynamic city of Colombo. Immerse yourself in Sri Lankan tradition, relax on pristine beaches, and experience vibrant city life. This thoughtfully crafted itinerary offers the perfect balance between cultural immersion, beachside tranquility, and vibrant city exploration, ensuring a luxurious yet leisurely travel experience.

service_data.service_name: Serene Sri Lanka: Culture, Coast & City Escape - 4 Nights / 5 Days
service_data.service_description:
Embark on a captivating journey through Sri Lanka, where culture, nature, and city life converge into a seamless and unforgettable experience. Begin your adventure in the historical city of Kandy, home to the sacred Temple of the Tooth Relic. Immerse yourself in Sri Lankan tradition with a vibrant Kandyan cultural show, and explore the scenic beauty and cultural landmarks of this hill country. From the tranquility of Kandy's lakeside to the stunning Royal Botanical Gardens, you’ll be surrounded by nature's elegance.

Next, journey to the serene coastal town of Bentota, where pristine beaches and crystal-clear waters provide the perfect setting for relaxation and adventure. Enjoy thrilling water sports, bask in the sun, and visit local turtle hatcheries, connecting with the island’s marine life.

Finally, experience the dynamic city of Colombo, where colonial charm meets modern flair. Explore historical landmarks like Gangaramaya Temple and Independence Square, then shop at bustling markets or indulge in Colombo’s lively nightlife. This thoughtfully crafted itinerary strikes the perfect balance between cultural immersion, beachside tranquility, and vibrant city exploration, ensuring a luxurious yet leisurely travel experience.

Itinerary

Day 1: Arrival in Kandy
• Arrival in Colombo and transfer to Kandy (3-4 hours).
• Evening: Enjoy a traditional cultural show and Kandyan dance performance.
Hotel options based on packages:
• Standard Package (3-star): Hotel Senani
• Deluxe Package (4-star): Earls Regent
• Premium Package (5-star): Mahaweli Reach

Day 2: Explore Kandy
• Visit the Temple of the Sacred Tooth Relic, stroll around Kandy Lake, and explore Kandy Market.
• Explore the Royal Botanical Gardens.
Hotel options based on packages:
• Standard Package (3-star): Hotel Senani
• Deluxe Package (4-star): Earls Regent
• Premium Package (5-star): Mahaweli Reach

Day 3: Bentota Beach
• Drive to Bentota (4-5 hours).
• Relax on Bentota Beach, enjoy water sports, and visit a turtle hatchery.
Hotel options based on packages:
• Standard Package (3-star): Hotel Aryana Ocean Queen
• Deluxe Package (4-star): The Palms
• Premium Package (5-star): Sheraton Kosgoda

Day 4: Colombo City Tour
• Transfer to Colombo (2 hours).
• Visit Gangaramaya Temple, Independence Square, and shop at Pettah Market.
• Evening: Experience Colombo’s vibrant nightlife.
Hotel options based on packages:
• Standard Package (3-star): Best Western
• Deluxe Package (4-star): Radisson Colombo
• Premium Package (5-star): Cinnamon Lakeside

Day 5: Departure
• Enjoy a final city walk or shopping before your transfer to the airport.
service_data.remarks: This is like a service customers are going visiting to.

data.activity_description: Experience the thrill of Advanced Night Diving with Island Scuba's 3-night course in Colombo. Led by experienced instructors, this training covers techniques for navigating, communicating, and observing nocturnal marine life. Dive into the underwater world after dark using specialized dive lights and discover a whole new realm of adventure beneath the moonlit waves. Join us from 21:00 to 22:00 on January 31, 2025, for an unforgettable experience. This is like a service customers are going visiting to.

service_data.service_name: Night Diver (3 Nights, 1 Dive Per Night) By Island Scuba
service_data.service_description: Advanced Night Diving Course by Island Scuba offers thrilling training for divers to explore the underwater world after dark. Led by experienced instructors, this course covers techniques for navigating, communicating, and observing nocturnal marine life. Participants learn to use specialized dive lights and develop confidence in low-light conditions, unlocking a whole new realm of underwater adventure and discovery beneath the moonlit waves.
service_data.remarks: This is like a service customers are going visiting to.

data.activity_description: Learn the art of creating silky smooth, dark staining Organic mehendi paste and perfect henna cones at the Online Mehendi Mixology workshop by Oh so Mehendi Individual Class. This educational course is perfect for children who are interested in honing their mehendi skills. The session will take place on February 1, 2025, starting at 10:00 AM. Please note that this is an in-person workshop, so participants are required to attend in person to learn the techniques. Get ready to immerse yourself in the world of beautiful henna designs!

service_data.service_name: Online Mehendi Mixology workshop by Oh so Mehendi Individual Class in Single Session
service_data.service_description: The mehendi mixology will teach you about making silky smooth, dark staining Organic mehendi paste and hand-rolling a perfect henna cone.
service_data.remarks: This is an education course. So customer needs to go to learn. Ignore the time slot.

data.activity_description: Welcome to Ramada by Wyndham Colombo, where you will enjoy a comfortable stay in the heart of the city. Experience modern rooms with essential amenities, an outdoor pool, and a variety of dining options offering international and local cuisine. Conveniently located near Galle Face Green and the beach, this hotel is ideal for both business and leisure travelers. Your stay includes 1 night with a Bed and Breakfast meal plan. Check-in time is typically between 2:00 PM to 3:00 PM. Get ready for a relaxing and enjoyable stay in Colombo!

service_data.service_description: Ramada Colombo offers a comfortable stay in the heart of the city, providing easy access to Colombo’s main attractions and business hubs. The hotel features modern rooms equipped with essential amenities, an outdoor pool, and a selection of dining options, including international and local cuisine. It is a convenient choice for both business and leisure travelers, with its proximity to Galle Face Green and the beach.
service_data.service_time: Standard hotel check-in time is usually around 2:00 PM to 3:00 PM
service_data.service_location: Ramada by Wyndham Colombo, 30 Sir Mohomad Macan Markar Mawatha, Colombo 00300
service_data.remarks: No Of nights count is 1. Add some attractive description for the no of nights Meal plan and others

data.activity_description: Embark on a captivating journey through Sri Lanka, where culture, nature, and city life converge into a seamless and unforgettable experience. Begin your adventure in the historical city of Kandy, explore the serene coastal town of Bentota, and experience the dynamic city of Colombo. From cultural shows to beach relaxation and city exploration, this 4-night, 5-day itinerary offers a perfect balance. Enjoy traditional performances, visit temples and markets, relax on pristine beaches, and explore historical landmarks before your departure from Colombo. Travel dates: February 27, 2025, from 9:00 AM to 7:00 PM.

service_data.service_name: Serene Sri Lanka: Culture, Coast & City Escape - 4 Nights / 5 Days

Begin your adventure in the historical city of Kandy, home to the sacred Temple of the Tooth Relic. Immerse yourself in Sri Lankan tradition with a vibrant Kandyan cultural show, and explore the scenic beauty and cultural landmarks of this hill country. Finally, experience the dynamic city of Colombo, where colonial charm meets modern flair. data.activity_description: Embark on a 8-day adventure in Sri Lanka, exploring its stunning landscapes and rich culture. Start in Bentota, relaxing on sun-kissed beaches and enjoying a boat excursion on the Madu River. Continue to Yala for a thrilling safari experience, spotting leopards and other wildlife. Discover the picturesque town of Ella, visit iconic landmarks like Ravana Falls and the Nine Arch Bridge. Immerse yourself in Kandy's vibrant culture and visit the Temple of the Sacred Tooth Relic. Conclude your journey in Colombo, exploring its bustling markets and historic sites. This itinerary offers a perfect blend of nature, wildlife, and cultural experiences.

service_data.service_name: Sri Lanka Highlights Adventure - 7 Nights / 8 Days
service_data.service_description:
Explore Sri Lanka’s stunning landscapes and rich culture. Begin in Bentota, where sun-kissed beaches invite relaxation and water sports. Next, explore Yala, home to diverse wildlife and the chance to spot leopards on a thrilling safari. Continue to the picturesque town of Ella, renowned for its lush hills and scenic train rides. In Kandy, immerse yourself in the vibrant culture, visiting the sacred Temple of the Tooth and enjoying traditional dance performances. Finally, conclude your adventure in Colombo, where you can explore bustling markets, historic sites, and enjoy the city's lively atmosphere. This itinerary offers a perfect blend of nature, wildlife, and cultural experiences.
 

Itinerary

Day 1: Arrival in Bentota

  • Airport – Bentota
    Arrival at Bandaranaike International Airport (Colombo).
    Meet your guide and transfer to Bentota (Approx. 2 hours).
    Relax and enjoy the evening at Bentota Beach.

Hotel options based on packages:

  • 3-Star: Aryana Beach / Blue Beach
  • 4-Star: Earls Reef / Palms Resort
  • 5-Star: Citrus Waskaduwa / Cinnamon Bey

Day 2: Bentota Exploration

  • Morning: Enjoy breakfast at the hotel.
  • Excursion: Experience a Madu River boat excursion in Balapitiya.
  • Turtle Hatchery: Visit the Kosgoda Turtle Hatchery to witness conservation efforts.
  • Evening: Leisure time to unwind at the beach.

Hotel options based on packages:

  • 3-Star: Aryana Beach / Blue Beach
  • 4-Star: Earls Reef / Palms Resort
  • 5-Star: Citrus Waskaduwa / Cinnamon Bey

Day 3: Yala Safari Adventure

  • Bentota to Yala
    After breakfast, transfer to Yala (Approx. 4 hours).
    Afternoon: Check-in at your Yala hotel.
    Evening: Enjoy a thrilling jeep safari at Yala National Park, home to leopards and other wildlife.

Hotel options based on packages:

  • 3-Star: Raintree / Magampura
  • 4-Star: Oakray Wild / Ekho Safari
  • 5-Star: Cinnamon Wild / Jetwing Yala

Day 4: Explore Ella

  • Yala to Ella
    Morning: After breakfast, drive to Ella (Approx. 3 hours).
  • Sightseeing: Visit the iconic Ravana Falls and the Nine Arch Bridge.

Hotel options based on packages:

  • 3-Star: MOI Ella - 4*
  • 4-Star: MOI Ella - 4*
  • 5-Star: La Ella Breeze

Day 5: Kandy

  • Ella to Kandy
    After breakfast, take a scenic train ride from Ella to Nanu Oya (subject to availability).
    Explore Nuwara Eliya’s colonial architecture and tea plantations before heading to Kandy.

Hotel options based on packages:

  • 3-Star: Rivendel - 4* / Serene Garden
  • 4-Star: Rivendel / Royal Kandyan
  • 5-Star: Grand Kandyan / Mahaweli Reach

Day 6: Kandy Exploration

  • City Tour: Visit the Temple of the Sacred Tooth Relic, a UNESCO World Heritage site, and explore Kandy City.
  • Evening: Enjoy a traditional Kandyan cultural show and a stroll around Kandy Lake.

Hotel options based on packages:

  • 3-Star: Rivendel - 4* / Serene Garden
  • 4-Star: Rivendel / Royal Kandyan
  • 5-Star: Grand Kandyan / Mahaweli Reach

Day 7: Colombo

  • Kandy to Colombo
    After breakfast, depart for Colombo (Approx. 3 hours).
    Visit Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage en route.
  • City Tour: Explore Colombo’s top attractions, including Independence Square and Gangaramaya Temple.

Hotel options based on packages:

  • 3-Star: Berjaya Colombo / Best Western
  • 4-Star: Pegasus Reef / Mirage Colombo
  • 5-Star: Cinnamon Lakeside

Day 8: Departure

  • Colombo to Airport
    After breakfast, transfer to Bandaranaike International Airport for departure.

End of Tour.
service_data.remarks: This is like a service customers are going visiting to.

data.activity_description: Embark on a captivating journey through Sri Lanka on the Serene Sri Lanka: Culture, Coast & City Escape - 4 Nights / 5 Days package. Begin in Kandy, experiencing the Temple of the Tooth Relic and a cultural show. Explore Kandy, visit the Royal Botanical Gardens, then head to Bentota for beach relaxation and water sports. In Colombo, discover historical landmarks and vibrant nightlife. This luxurious itinerary offers a perfect blend of culture, relaxation, and city exploration. Depart on Day 5 after a final city walk or shopping spree.

data.activity_description: Experience the thrill of night diving with the Advanced Night Diver course by Island Scuba in Colombo. This 3-night course includes 1 dive per night from 21:00 to 22:00, led by experienced instructors. Learn techniques for navigating, communicating, and observing nocturnal marine life using specialized dive lights. Explore a whole new underwater world beneath the moonlit waves. This is a must-try adventure for any diving enthusiast looking to expand their skills and experience the magic of night diving.
